Entry.JapaneseText: あんなにたくさんの船が海を封鎖してるなんて…… でも、軍ってあんなに船を持ってるんだネ。
Entry.EnglishText: To think they'd have so many ships blockading the harbor... But I suppose the military has the ships to spare.

Entry.JapaneseText: 普段は海洋上を巡航しているからな。 もっと多くの船が集まった事件もあった。
Entry.EnglishText: Well, normally they would be out to sea. There's been other incidents where even more ships had been assembled.
Entry.Notes: Next line: Whaat... Well, if there's this many ships, then something serious is going on, right?

Entry.JapaneseText: 一体、ナニがあるんだろ……
Entry.EnglishText: But just what the heck would that be...?
